summary: Two men carry at night four suitcases of contraband meat across German-occupied Paris during WWII. Their opposite personalities and strange encounters provoke different adventures - until they are arrested by the police.
cast: Jean Gabin|Bourvil|Louis de Funès|Jeannette Batti|Georgette Anys|Robert Arnoux|Laurence Badie|Myno Burney|Germaine Delbat|Monette Dinay|Jean Dunot|Bernard Lajarrige|Jacques Marin|Hubert de Lapparent|Hans Verner|Hugues Wanner|Martine Alexis|Béatrice Arnac|Paul Barge|Georges Bever|René Brun|Anne Carrère|Yvonne Claudie|Anne Cuvelier|Yvette Cuvelier|Anouk Ferjac|Clément Harari|René Hell|Henri Lambert|Albert Michel|Michèle Nadal|Hubert Noël|Maryse Paillet|Claude Vernier|Jean Vinci|Louis Viret|Harald Wolff
keywords: paris france|suitcase|black market|world war two in france|place name in title
title: La travesía de París
